title: Lippincott Q&A Medicine Review Clinical Rotations and Exams
description:
TITLE/EDITION Lippincott Q&A Medicine: Review for Clinical Rotations and Exams
By: Mark Duncan (Author), Lance Chapman (Author)
Paperback: 568 pages
Publisher: LWW (May 26, 2015)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1451195214
ISBN-13: 978-1451195217
NOTE: This is the standalone ebook and may not include access codes that come packaged with the bound book



Lippincott Q&A Medicine focuses on high-yield information specifically designed to help you improve your NBME subject exam score.
